name: Pooky's Forest
description:
Description:
Pooky's Forest is a game prototype created by a small group of people who are learning as they go over a time period of 40 hours - including figuring out the game idea, creating game concepts, assets and code.

The game is a puzzle platformer with three different kinds of elements that interact with the world (Ice, Water, Fire) that can be obtained via scaring the elemental ghosts and then eating them!

The objective of this prototype was to learn as much about game programming and art as we could and create the sufficient code and assets in case anyone wants to continue on the project.

Code and assets available here:
https://github.com/gamerswhocode/pooky

Controls:

Move: Arrow Keys
Jump: Space Bar
Roar: C
Eat: V

Credits:
In game credits available after completing the level.
